nodes.text: The Second Colonial Protectorate was a Galactic Republic colony built in the Brell Sediment.

The Second Colonial Protectorate appears in the Imperial version of the planet Taris in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. It takes the place of the Junction, a class-restricted area for the Jedi Consular in the Republic version of Taris, and the Junction is moved to the Tularan Marsh.
